statements: DELETE FROM endangered_marine_species WHERE conservation_area = 'Great Barrier Reef'
DELETE FROM endangered_marine_species WHERE conservation_area = 'Great Barrier Reef'
DELETE FROM EndangeredSpecies WHERE conservation_area_id = 2 AND population_count < 1000;
DELETE FROM ConservationAreas WHERE area_id IN (SELECT conservation_area_id FROM EndangeredSpecies WHERE population_count < 500);
DELETE FROM PopulationRecords WHERE record_date < '2021-01-01' AND population_count < 1000;
DELETE FROM ConservationAreas WHERE id = 5 AND area_name = 'Forest National Park';
